Articles.Content:
Hi.

So i have since a few days a pretty big problem.

So whats wrong?....

My gears are set different than normal, its hard to explain so see yourself..

http://imgur.com/PoWoEqQ

sorry for my bad english.

Welcome to the forums, Pruchol5!

That looks like a known bug. Sometimes, symmetry causes parts to duplicate. You can see that in the graphical glitches in the jet fuselage pieces. The easiest fix is to rebuild the whole craft. You can try putting some parts into a subassembly to save time.

Also, it might help to build your rovers in the Space Plane Hangar.
